class.name: FieldElement
class.description: This class is a wrapper around a Starknet field element (felt), which is the primitive data type in Cairo. It's a 252-bit unsigned integer, used to represent everything from numbers to contract addresses. This class provides methods to interact with the underlying value, converting it to and from different Godot types. When printed, it will output as PackedByteArray representation of the felt.

method.name: as_packed_array
method.description: Returns the raw [PackedByteArray] representation of the field element.
